TopicTitle: To celebrate the Perseverance landing, firebird@hardbrake.

Articles.Content:
Yes I messed up a bit and then the question was, how much aerobraking could you get. 
Impossible without KAS as I had to modify the craft to keep ship stable at +8 g drag but they was designed for 4g. 
Now with KAS you could move stuff around and reduce the drag in an simulation, then the kerbals had to repeat it at the craft.
